sense.def:
Submission
je stanje, ko so ljudje prisiljeni sprejeti nadvlado nekoga drugega.

seg.quote: The trade unions were brought into submission.

sense.def:
The submission of a proposal or application
je to, da nekomu pošljemo predlog ali prošnjo, da bi se lahko odločil, ali jo bo sprejel ali ne;

seg.quote: ...the submission of these plans to the local authority.
